abstract: Criminal complaints against New York City Police Lt Robert Sung and Detective Yatyu Yam reveal men took bribes from karaoke bar owners in Queens to provide owners with advance warning of inspections and raids; men have been arrested and charged with taking bribes and official misconduct.
lead_paragraph: A New York City police lieutenant and a detective took bribes from the owners of karaoke bars in Queens and gave warnings of police raids, according to criminal complaints.

headline.main: 2 in New York Police Dept. Are Accused of Taking Bribes From Bar Owners
headline.print_headline: 2 in Police Dept. Are Accused of Taking Bribes From Bars

snippet: A New York City police lieutenant and a detective took bribes from the owners of karaoke bars in Queens and gave warnings of police raids, according to criminal complaints.
